subject: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
CENTRAL BUSINESS DISTRICT,
P.M.B 0187,GARKI, ABUJA- NIGERIA,
Good Morning,
A power of attorney was forwarded to my office on Friday by two
gentlemen, one of them is an American national and he is Mr. Charles
Weston by name while the other person is Mr. Joseph Bevan by name a
CANADIAN National.
This gentlemen claimed to be your representative, and this power of
attorney stated that you are dead, they brought an account to replace
your information in other to claim your fund which is now lying
DORMANT and UNCLAIMED, below is the new account they have submitted:
CITIBANK N.A.
THE LAKES
8701 W. SAHARA Ave
LAS VEGAS NV 89117
ACCOUNT 153 132 303
ROUTING 3222-7172-4
SWIFT CITI US 33
Be further informed that this power of attorney also stated that you
suffered and died of throat cancer. You are therefore given 72hrs to
confirm the truth in this information, If you are still alive, You are
to contact me back immediately, Because i work 72hrs just to ensure
that i monitor all the activities going on in regards to the transfer
of beneficiaries inheritance and contract payment.
You are to reply to this office immediately for clarifications on this
matter as I will  be available 24 hrs to attend to you and give you
the necessary guidelines on how to ensure that your payment is wired
to you immediately.
Also be informed that any further delay from your side could be
dangerous, as I would not be held responsible for wrong payment.
Thanks
Godwin  Emefiele

subject: Re:    CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
Good Morning,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprising message to receive! I can assure you that I am very much alive and well, and certainly not suffering from throat cancer.

I'm curious about these gentlemen who claim to be representing me. Could you tell me more about how they proved their identities? And how did they come across my information?

Also, could you please provide more details about this fund that is supposedly in my name? How did it come into existence and why has it been left unclaimed?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Justin

subject: Re: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
CENTRAL BUSINESS DISTRICT,
P.M.B 0187,GARKI, ABUJA- NIGERIA,

Dear Mr Justin,

Thank you so much for your email. I am so happy as your Alive based on that
GOD will give you more years to come.

Mr.Justin, that is the problem we are having here in our bank. After some
time some people will come up to claim the Fund does not belong to them.

Since you're still Alive i am going to try my best to make sure you receive
this $35Million Dollars. All I need from you is honesty.

As I have started working on your Payment I would like you to confirm the
below information to me immediately.

A. YOUR FIRST AND YOUR LAST NAME...................

B. YOUR REAL BANKING INFORMATION...................

C. YOUR CONTRACT AMOUNT.....................

D. YOUR COMPANY NAME AND ADDRESS..............

E. YOUR HOME ADDRESS.................

F. YOUR MOBILE PHONE NUMBER............

G. YOUR AGE................
Thanks
Mr. Ken Benson
